recommendations.title: Reconcile Artifact Catalog Discrepancy (49 vs 86)
recommendations.description: Perform controlled diff between earlier 49-file inventory and newer 86-file list; classify additions as real new artifacts vs duplicates or backup derivatives.

recommendations.title: Generate Archive Manifest with SHA-256 Hashes
recommendations.description: After reconciliation, produce authoritative manifest including file size, activity state, orphan risk, and compute SHA-256 for integrity.

recommendations.title: Classify Artifacts by Activity & Confidence Scores
recommendations.description: Assign ACTIVE/RECENT/STALE/LEGACY state and HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW confidence to each artifact to drive migration batching decisions.

recommendations.title: Establish Migration Batches & Dry-Run Plan
recommendations.description: Group artifacts into batches by confidence and activity; simulate relocation paths without modifying source directories.

recommendations.title: Automate Integrity Verification Script
recommendations.description: Create script to parse manifest JSON, recompute hashes, and flag mismatches prior to any real migration.

recommendations.title: Add Evidence Bundle Generation
recommendations.description: Produce JSONL evidence log summarizing manifest creation, hashing, and classification events for audit.
